Subject: Junit3.7 : swing dialog box bug on solaris?

Hi,

I searched the mailing list archive but couldn't find this question.  When
I bring up the swingui.TestRunner on Solaris, if I try to hit the "..."
button I get a brief flash that looks like a dialog trying to draw itself,
but it never shows up, just returns to the main window.  PROBLEM - the app
is hung at this point, and no keystrokes or button clicks will work.  I
have to kill the window.

On Linux this wasn't a problem, the dialog saying "No Test Cases found" (or
something like that) came up fine.

I do get the usual array of "font specific in font.properties not found..."
messages that are apparently so common when using Swing under Solaris.
Could this be the problem? Didn't find the dialog fonts and couldn't make
the box, or something? Unfortunately my best google searching didn't
provide me with a good answer to the solaris font.properties problem, so I
was hoping to ignore it :).

If it's important to mention I should point out that I'm hitting my solaris
box through a vnc server.  I dunno if that has anything to do with
anything, but thought I'd mention it.

Duane
